original_text: But David was not able to go there to meet with the Lord, because he was afraid of the sword of the Lord's angel.
korean_text: 다윗이 여호와의 천사의 칼을 두려워하여 감히 그 앞에 가서 하나님께 묻지 못하더라

sentences.original_text: But David was not able to go there
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 다윗은 그곳에 갈 수 없었으니

sentences.original_text: of the sword of the Lord's angel
